name: Astral Planes
description:
[Try windows build for a better experience]

Astral Planes was made for Physics Jam with theme Switch but unfortunately my export crash and got not enough time to fix it !
After eating something, and put the kids to bed, I fixed it,  but it was too late, So it is not part of the jam.

In Astral Planes, you are a spirit following the Spiritual paths.  The specificity is that you must switch between Astral Planes to always be on the path.

It's an experiment, and it's pretty difficult to master.

Feel free to leave a feedback, and let me know what you like/dislike.
